job.title: Senior Data Engineer - Kubernetes (Remote)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Title:
Senior Data Engineer
Salary:
$140,000 - $170,000
Requirements:
5-10+ years as a Data Engineer + Docker/Kubernetes + Python + AWS
We are a 200 person SaaS healthcare company with a mission to improve quality of life. We have experienced consistent growth for the past 6 years and are continuing to scale our engineering team.
If you are looking for a role at a technology company where you can have a positive impact on peoples lives and healthcare, please apply today!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Competitive salary ($140k - $170k)
Work w/ Industry Pros who have a few impressive exits under their belts
Full Benefits (health, dental, vision, etc.)
Have your voice be heard in and play a role in company direction
Huge opportunity for career and personal growth
What You Will Be Doing
Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture
Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements
Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements
Handle production issues
Ensure code is high quality through automated tests, monitoring, etc.
Collaborate with team to provide visibility into the data layer and related pipelines
What You Need for this Position
5-10+ years as a data engineer
Python preferred (Java considered)
AWS
Kubernetes (Helm is desired)
Data lake solutions like Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Databricks
SQL
Experience in the healthcare industry is a plus
BS in CS (or related) is preferred
So, if you are a Senior Data Engineer - Kubernetes (Remote) with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Danny.Herries@Optello.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DH1-1639294 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Danny Herries - Lead Recruiter - Optello
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
